name: Conrad Bravo
text: This place has seen some rough years as of late. Used to be better maintained and run. But they still get the job done when it comes to pizza. Pizza is a pretty greasy but good on flavor, sauce and crust. Breadsticks are still top notch but â€¦More

text: Great food Great Service!! Buffet and salad bar is Great!! They keep it well stocked during Buffet hours.

name: Jillian Astbury
text: Other than the floor being sticky everywhere it was good. Salad bar was nice and fresh and clean. Buffet pizza left a lot to be desired as the choices were limited and breadsticks dry. Not bad for the price.

name: jack francis
text:
There was a disgusting number of flies dozens on each table so I asked to waitres  if she served fly swatters with her meals she says we don't like them ether.
So I asked why don't you come in and clear them out with some spray or something early in the morning before busyness she seemed to be oblivious to what I was saying i left

text: Pizza was good nice and hot but the Pepperoni Lover's pizza looked like a regular pepperoni pizza. The floor was so sticky that it almost pulled my shoes off my feet. It would not be a good idea to wear flip-flops in there you might not get â€¦More

text: We called ahead to order 14 pizzas to feed large youth group. The manager worked with us on price and was super helpful! The pizza was hot and ready when we got there and tasted amazing. A lot of the time when we have ordered like this from â€¦More

text: Kinda dirty. But food is cheap for you buck. Recommand the buffet. Just check your plate. Cant tell you how many times I found food on a plate. Not just a little a lot. But very good food. Staff is ok. Depends on what day you go. Manager is rude. It's about 50/50 chance you will enjoy it. Some days are better then others.
